name: Children's Museum of Sonoma County
description: Interactive museum with hands-on STEAM exhibits for children ages 0-10. Features indoor and outdoor exhibits including Mary's Garden and Little Russian River.
fullDescription: Interactive museum with hands-on STEAM exhibits for children ages 0-10. Features indoor and outdoor exhibits including Mary's Garden and Little Russian River.
address: 1835 W Steele Ln, Santa Rosa, CA 95401
keywords: Children's Museum Sonoma, Santa Rosa, STEAM, hands-on, kids, ages 0-10, Mary's Garden, interactive exhibits
